news.title: Sisters waive anonymity to shame rapist brother who is ex-priest
news.summary: A former priest who raped and systemically abused his three sisters alongside his older brother in their family home has been jailed for eight years.

news.title: Woman convicted of facilitating the rape of her daughter by the child’s uncle 20 years ago
news.summary: A woman has been convicted of facilitating the rape of her daughter by her brother more than 20 years ago.

news.title: Harris says EU not reaching tariff agreement with US ‘regrettable’ as Trump says he is open to talks
‘I’m just super proud to represent Ireland and wear the yellow jersey’ – Ben Healy on taking overall Tour de France lead
news.summary: Ben Healy became the first Irish rider to wear the yellow jersey at the Tour de France since Stephen Roche back in 1987 when he stormed into the race lead today after an epic Bastille Day breakaway on stage ten into Puy de Saucy.

news.title: DJ Carey poses diplomatic dilemma for GAA as disgraced star due for All-Ireland final honour in Croke Park
news.summary: DJ Carey entered the first All-Ireland final of the new millennium under pressure.

news.title: Neighbours couldn't recognise Tom Niland due to blood and facial injuries, court hears
news.summary: Pensioner Tom Niland was so badly beaten during an alleged home invasion that his neighbours did not recognise him walking along the middle of the road covered in blood, wearing odd shoes and with his eyes swollen shut, a Central Criminal Court trial has heard.

news.title: Trump warns Russia to reach ceasefire within 50 days or face sanctions
news.summary: US President Donald Trump on Monday announced a toughened stance against Russia for its war in Ukraine, promising a fresh wave of missiles and other weaponry for Ukraine and giving Moscow 50 days to reach a ceasefire or face sanctions.

news.title: Owen Farrell’s role and a lack of wizards from Oz: Our jury answer the key questions ahead of first Lions Test in Brisbane
news.summary: 1. What have you made of the Lions’ performances in Australia to date and who has been their best player?

news.title: Fionnán Sheahan: Cautious and conservative Mairead McGuinness is the polar opposite of opinionated Michael D Higgins
news.summary: Mairead McGuinness is the clear frontrunner to become our next president. Tomorrow, she will be unofficially confirmed as Fine Gael’s only nominated candidate.

news.title: Dear Vicki: Am I legally allowed to make a woman redundant while she is on maternity leave?
news.summary: Q – As the owner of food distribution company which has been badly hit by all the uncertainty over tariffs, I simply have to let about a quarter of the workforce go, and I have a business case to support that.
